entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning early this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
